msg: ([buildtest][reliability] HttpConnectionTest fails when www.apache.org is not accessible)

author: jeremias
msg: Expose a method to allow the PS Renderer to predict what kind of pipeline will be selected (because it doesn't support all image types as PostScript forms)
If there are multiple candidate pipelines for one conversion type, choose the one with the lowest penalty, not just the one that happens to be first.

msg: Precisely define the expectations for the area parameter in Graphics2DImagePainter.

author: skitching
msg: TOMAHAWK-1163 - Support selecting week and month in calendar
TOMAHAWK-689  - Support custom styling for calendar
* add "selectMode" attribute for inputCalendar, add some new icons.
* support setting popupTheme: previously this component attribute was just ignored.
